thread.title: Everything to know about North Texas-Portland State, including predictions, analysis, radio info and more
thread.title_full: Everything to know about North Texas-Portland State, including predictions, analysis, radio info and more | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Everything to know about North Texas-Portland State, including predictions, analysis, radio info and more
text:
UNT desperately needs to get something going to build positive momentum for the program. The Mean Green have lost four straight to open the season, including their first two games in Conference USA play. UNT will face Western Kentucky and Marshall in its next two games after facing the Vikings and could be looking at an 0-7 start, if it can't beat Portland State, a team that competes in the Football Championship Subdivision. UNT is paying Portland State a $425,000 guarantee to come to Denton to play. It would be a tough turn of events for the Mean Green to fork over the kind of money without getting the win they need.
Portland State has a chance to show that lightning can indeed strike twice with a second win over a Football Bowl Subdivision program in the same season. The Vikings have already beaten Washington State and can show it was no fluke by beating UNT. -- Brett Vito
Who: Portland State (3-1) at North Texas (0-4)
When: 4 p.m. Saturday
Where: Apogee Stadium in Denton
TV/radio: No TV / KHYI-FM (95.3), KNTU-FM (88.1)
Portland State at North Texas
